algorithm_technique: Matrix rotation simulation with gravity effect, iterating backwards to place stones.
problem_summary_simple: Rotate a box 90 degrees clockwise and let stones fall due to gravity.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate 90-degree clockwise rotation of a 2D grid, applying gravity to stones ('#') after rotation.
key_insights: The rotation effectively transposes the matrix and reverses rows.
Processing columns in reverse order after rotation simplifies gravity simulation.
A temporary variable `k` tracks the landing position for stones in each column.
